page.title: 11WROXALL:THE VILLAGE SCHOOL 2
page.content:
Every year the school has a{Sports Day in July. When Mrs.Trolley came to the school,she introduced a new way for Sports Day. The races used to be in ages,but now they are in houses.This year the school is going to have a picnic and then the sports.
Mrs.Trolley would like to see the {community}join in with the school more. At the moment the school building is used as a polling station for local and general elections,and the Parish Council meets there.
The Headmistress writes a diary called a{Log Book.}In it she records what happens in the school. The school still has a very old Log Book,in which previous headteachers have written about the school.
